function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to urban or indoor environments without green spaces","Impact":"Negative impact on mental and physical health, increased stress, and reduced recovery time","Mitigation":"Increase access to green spaces in urban and indoor environments, promote the use of parks and green areas for relaxation and health improvement","Technologies":"Urban planning to integrate more green spaces, development of indoor green environments, promotion of parks and forest areas","People":"Residents, visitors, and patients in urban and indoor environments","Owner":"Urban planners, city officials, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Lack of greenspace in healthcare settings","Impact":"Prolonged recovery time, increased stress, and reduced mental well-being for patients","Mitigation":"Integrate greenspaces within healthcare facilities, encourage views of nature from hospital windows, provide access to natural environments for patients","Technologies":"Incorporation of gardens and green areas within healthcare facilities, design of nature-centered patient rooms, implementation of greenery in hospital surroundings","People":"Patients in healthcare settings, healthcare providers, hospital administrators","Owner":"Healthcare facility administrators, architects, and designers"},{"Description":"Small sample sizes in studies on forest bathing","Impact":"Limited generalizability of results, potential for biased or unrepresentative findings","Mitigation":"Conduct larger and more representative studies on the effects of forest bathing, ensure diversity and inclusion in participant recruitment","Technologies":"Advanced data collection and statistical analysis techniques, recruitment and engagement strategies for diverse participant groups","People":"Researchers, participants in forest bathing studies","Owner":"Research institutions, funding organizations"}]}
